entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 7:58AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PEAK OF THE STORM WILL CONTINUE THROUGH NOON... Damaging winds and flooding rain will continue throughout southern New England this morning, before conditions slowly begin to improve this afternoon. Minor to moderate coastal flooding is also expected along the South Coast of Rhode Island and Massachusetts around the midday high tide.
